skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Glorious Warfare
skillTree.description: As the corruption of Chaos seeps into the land like a sickness, the glory and strength of those forces pledged eternally to Ruin can only grow and grow.

skillTree.name: Infecting Presence
skillTree.description: The corruption of Chaos infects all it touches, stretching its dark tendrils out across the land.

skillTree.name: Growing Chaos
skillTree.description: The provinces shall bloat with wonderous corruption, expanding amidst the glory of success.

skillTree.name: Unforgiving Rule
skillTree.description: Chaos grips the local populace with an iron fist, discouraging all disorder lest it tighten and choke.

skillTree.name: Respect of the North
skillTree.description: Many servants of Chaos are connected by a Ruinous web that joins their forces in common cause.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +10 with Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Beastmen and Norsca
Diplomatic relations: +20 with Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Beastmen and Norsca
Diplomatic relations: +30 with Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Beastmen and Norsca

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Vengeful Companions
skillTree.description: Raging and roaring in the cause of Chaos Undivided, the forces of Khorne bray for battle with even greater fury.

skillTree.name: Friends of Decay
skillTree.description: The unwholesome, decrepit warriors of Nurgle stand bolstered among the united forces of Chaos.

skillTree.name: Acolytes of Change
skillTree.description: The unified forces of Chaos thrill the Lord of Change, who delights in seeing once-fierce enemies transformed into a weapon of untold annihilation.

skillTree.name: Intimate Allies
skillTree.description: Merged under a single Ruinous banner, the servants of Slaanesh find new pleasures within this unholy alliance.

skillTree.name: Fury of the Faithful
skillTree.description: Pure, irrepressible rage is but an act of worship to the Blood God's glory.

skillTree.name: Wrathful Reaver
skillTree.description: The dead and the dying have no use for material goods, and the living do not deserve to keep what they could not protect.

skillTree.name: Destroyer
skillTree.description: Khorne thrives in the wake of wanton destruction; let the towns and cities of his foes burn to the ground around them.

skillTree.name: Unholy Terror Troopers
skillTree.description: When you strike a warrior of Khorne, strike hard and with more strength than you dare, for what doesn't kill them only makes them stronger, and angrier.

effects.description:
Armour: +6 for Bloodletters of Khorne, Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne, Marauders of Khorne, Forsaken of Khorne, Blood Shrine of Khorne and Chaos Warriors of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +8 for Bloodletters of Khorne, Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne, Marauders of Khorne, Forsaken of Khorne, Blood Shrine of Khorne and Chaos Warriors of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Bloodletters of Khorne, Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne, Marauders of Khorne, Forsaken of Khorne, Blood Shrine of Khorne and Chaos Warriors of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Bloodletters of Khorne, Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne, Marauders of Khorne, Forsaken of Khorne, Blood Shrine of Khorne and Chaos Warriors of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Bloodletters of Khorne, Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne, Marauders of Khorne, Forsaken of Khorne, Blood Shrine of Khorne and Chaos Warriors of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Might of the Chosen
skillTree.description: The Blood God rewards the agents of His glory, for what strengthens the Lord of Murder so too bolsters his forces.

effects.description: Reign of Chaos: additional chance for Khorne rewards +5%

skillTree.name: Endless March
skillTree.description: Warriors pledged to Khorne never tire of war, but are honed by battle fury into sharp instruments of violent rage.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Riders of Doom
skillTree.description: Astride terrifying mounts and riding rattling chariots of bone, the forces of Khorne are a whirlwind of pure destruction on the charge.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +12% for Gorebeast Chariot of Khorne, Bloodcrushers of Khorne and Skullcrushers of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +5% for Gorebeast Chariot of Khorne, Bloodcrushers of Khorne and Skullcrushers of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +15% for Gorebeast Chariot of Khorne, Bloodcrushers of Khorne and Skullcrushers of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Gorebeast Chariot of Khorne, Bloodcrushers of Khorne and Skullcrushers of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +18% for Gorebeast Chariot of Khorne, Bloodcrushers of Khorne and Skullcrushers of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Bloodthirsty Beasts
skillTree.description: The bestial minions of the Blood God charge the enemy, ripping and tearing at their flesh until no breath remains.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Flesh Hounds of Khorne, Chaos Warhounds, Chaos Furies, Spawn of Khorne, and Minotaurs of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Flesh Hounds of Khorne, Chaos Warhounds, Chaos Furies, Spawn of Khorne, and Minotaurs of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +5 for Flesh Hounds of Khorne, Chaos Warhounds, Chaos Furies, Spawn of Khorne, and Minotaurs of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Flesh Hounds of Khorne, Chaos Warhounds, Chaos Furies, Spawn of Khorne, and Minotaurs of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Flesh Hounds of Khorne, Chaos Warhounds, Chaos Furies, Spawn of Khorne, and Minotaurs of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Raging Might
skillTree.description: Deliver rampant Chaos unto the unwary, and all manner of powers shall be awarded in Khorne's name.

effects.description: Reign of Chaos: additional chance for Khorne rewards +10%

skillTree.name: Forged in Fury
skillTree.description: A weapon forged in a fire of searing hatred strikes harder than any average blade.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +6% for Bloodthirster units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Bloodthirster units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Bloodthirster units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Warpmetal Edge
skillTree.description: When the Harvesters of Doom take to the field, a violent ringing of metal echoes with every mechanical swing and thrust of their blades.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +4% for Soul Grinder of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +7% for Soul Grinder of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Soul Grinder of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Spilling the Blood
skillTree.description: There is no greater embodiment of Khorne's all-encompassing wrath than spilling the blood of a weak and pitiful enemy.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Bloodthirster and Chaos Warshrine of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Bloodthirster and Chaos Warshrine of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Bloodthirster and Chaos Warshrine of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Rage Within the Machine
skillTree.description: Emerging from the Forge of Souls trapped in a prison of metal and gears, the heavy machinery of the Clinkerspawn possesses an undeniably brutal strength.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Soul Grinder of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Soul Grinder of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Soul Grinder of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Martial Mastery (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Defensive Dedication (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Impure Prayer
skillTree.description: Uncleanliness is next to Godliness.

skillTree.name: Grimy Terrain
skillTree.description: The perils of passing through hostile terrain matter little when the Lord of Decay guides your path.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Rotting Nourishment
skillTree.description: Disease and decay ravage the corpses littering every battlefield, reinforcing the blighted warriors of Nurgle.

skillTree.name: Plague Troopers
skillTree.description: The putrid stench that emanates from the warriors of Nurgle is somehow not the most deadly thing about them.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Nurglings, Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Exalted Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Chaos Warriors of Nurgle, Marauders of Nurgle and Forsaken of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Nurglings, Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Exalted Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Chaos Warriors of Nurgle, Marauders of Nurgle and Forsaken of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Nurglings, Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Exalted Plaguebearers of Nurgle and Forsaken of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Nurglings, Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Exalted Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Chaos Warriors of Nurgle, Marauders of Nurgle and Forsaken of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Nurglings, Plaguebearers of Nurgle, Exalted Plaguebearers of Nurgle and Forsaken of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Noxious Abilities
skillTree.description: As Nurgle's withering decay spreads, plaguing the mortal realms, the power of His faithful followers only continues to grow.

effects.description: Reign of Chaos: additional chance for Nurgle rewards +5%

skillTree.name: Toxic Resolve
skillTree.description: Those most devoted to Grandfather Nurgle's noxious cause sustain themselves wholly on the infectious virulence of their Lord.

skillTree.name: Unholy Resilience
skillTree.description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord

skillTree.name: Plague Spreaders
skillTree.description: The pox-ridden plague sweeps down upon its victims, like all the best virulent diseases.

effects.description:
Speed: +3% for Chaos Furies, Rot Flies and Plague Drones of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +6% for Chaos Furies, Rot Flies and Plague Drones of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: 4% for Chaos Furies, Rot Flies, Warhounds (poison) and Plague Drones of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +9% for Chaos Furies, Rot Flies and Plague Drones of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: 8% for Chaos Furies, Rot Flies, Warhounds (poison) and Plague Drones of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Rancid Menagerie
skillTree.description: This macabre grotesquerie of rancid creatures in service to the Plague Lord are notoriously hard to kill.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Plague Toad, Pox Rider, Beast of Nurgle and Spawn of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +8 for Plague Toad, Pox Rider, Beast of Nurgle and Spawn of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Plague Toad, Pox Rider, Beast of Nurgle and Spawn of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Plague Toad, Pox Rider, Beast of Nurgle and Spawn of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Plague Toad, Pox Rider, Beast of Nurgle and Spawn of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Malignant Power
skillTree.description: Infect the weak, spread a plague or two, and let glorious Chaos sweep the land  these are the accomplishments that garner the Plague God's favour.

effects.description: Reign of Chaos: additional chance for Nurgle rewards +10%

skillTree.name: Corpulent Carapace
skillTree.description: It is hard for any weapon to penetrate such an overflowing mass of bloated flesh.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +6 for Great Unclean One units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Great Unclean One units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +10 for Great Unclean One units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Foul Miasma
skillTree.description: What better protection is there than a stench so stomach-churningly revolting that it repels every creature in its wake?

effects.description:
Armour: +5 for Great Unclean One units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Great Unclean One units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +15 for Great Unclean One units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Warpmetal Panoply
skillTree.description: Thick plates of filth-ridden, Daemonic metal deflect all but the most grievous of blows.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +6 for Soul Grinder of Nurgle and Chaos Warshrine of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Soul Grinder of Nurgle and Chaos Warshrine of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +10 for Soul Grinder of Nurgle and Chaos Warshrine of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Mechanical Range
skillTree.description: With the mechanical whirr of heavy gears, the Soul Grinders of Nurgle launch foul projectiles over impossible distances.

effects.description:
Range: +5% for Soul Grinder of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Range: +10% for Soul Grinder of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

Range: +15% for Soul Grinder of Nurgle units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Unholy Worship
skillTree.description: The true experience of divinity can be found in the ecstasy of indulgence.

skillTree.name: Beguiling
skillTree.description: Few need much persuasion to serve the Prince of Pleasure; the draw of pursuing one's every debased fantasy often proves too tempting to resist.

skillTree.name: Grace & Guile
skillTree.description: The Dark Prince rejoices to see such Chaos sown amongst his foes.

skillTree.name: Temptation's Troopers
skillTree.description: Though fighting with a graceful elegance, every strike from the warriors of Slaanesh lands with devastating impact.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +4% for Daemonettes of Slaanesh, Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh, Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh and Marauders of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Daemonettes of Slaanesh, Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Marauders of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for Daemonettes of Slaanesh, Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh, Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh and Marauders of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Daemonettes of Slaanesh, Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Marauders of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Daemonettes of Slaanesh, Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh, Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh and Marauders of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Seductive Promises
skillTree.description: The powers promised by Slaanesh are alluring indeed, and worth any price to acquire.

effects.description: Reign of Chaos: additional chance for Slaanesh rewards +5%

skillTree.name: Battle Delight
skillTree.description: The pleasures of battle are often all that is needed to sate a warrior's appetite.

skillTree.name: Devious Plotting
skillTree.description: The expression of surprise on an ambushed foe's face is always a particularly delectable treat.

skillTree.name: Enticing Colossi
skillTree.description: Even the most monstrous creatures in the Dark Prince's armies possess a horrific sort of beauty, lulling their victims into the most fatal kind of complacency.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Forsaken of Slaanesh and Fiends of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +15 for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Forsaken of Slaanesh and Fiends of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence: +6 for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Forsaken of Slaanesh and Fiends of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +20 for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Forsaken of Slaanesh and Fiends of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence: +12 for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Forsaken of Slaanesh and Fiends of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ravishing Cavalcade
skillTree.description: It is easy to be distracted by the beauty of Slaanesh's mounts, even as they close in to deliver your agonising death.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +12% for Seekers of Slaanesh, Heartseekers of Slaanesh, Hellstriders of Slaanesh, Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot, Marauder Horsemen of Slaanesh and Hellflayers units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +5% for Seekers of Slaanesh, Heartseekers of Slaanesh, Hellstriders of Slaanesh, Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot, Marauder Horsemen of Slaanesh and Hellflayers units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +15% for Seekers of Slaanesh, Heartseekers of Slaanesh, Hellstriders of Slaanesh, Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot, Marauder Horsemen of Slaanesh and Hellflayers units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Seekers of Slaanesh, Heartseekers of Slaanesh, Hellstriders of Slaanesh, Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot, Marauder Horsemen of Slaanesh and Hellflayers units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +18% for Seekers of Slaanesh, Heartseekers of Slaanesh, Hellstriders of Slaanesh, Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot, Marauder Horsemen of Slaanesh and Hellflayers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Alluring Visions
skillTree.description: As the Dark Prince's malignant influence spreads, his followers are most delightfully rewarded with abilities beyond even their wildest dreams.

effects.description: Reign of Chaos: additional chance for Slaanesh rewards +10%

skillTree.name: Duality
skillTree.description: The art of combat is much like an intricate dance  fluid, graceful, and always building up to a killer finale.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Keeper of Secrets units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Keeper of Secrets units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Keeper of Secrets units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: A Fine Edge
skillTree.description: Weapons should be as finely honed as the body, and both should be capable of inflicting the most wicked harm in Slaanesh's name.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +4% for Keeper of Secrets units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Keeper of Secrets units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Keeper of Secrets units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Engineered for Destruction
skillTree.description: Though being trapped in a prison of hellish Warpmetal is torturous for a soul inclined to freedom, the raw power it grants somewhat eases its burden.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Soul Grinder of Slaanesh and Chaos Warshrine of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Soul Grinder of Slaanesh and Chaos Warshrine of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +12 for Soul Grinder of Slaanesh and Chaos Warshrine of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Powerful Prison
skillTree.description: Capturing the beauty of battle is impossible from inside a mechanical tomb, yet the pleasure of the kill is no less enticing.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +6% for Soul Grinder of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Soul Grinder of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Soul Grinder of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Storm of Change
skillTree.description: Follow the changing winds, and the blessings of the Raven God can be earned amidst the tempest.

skillTree.name: Reinforcer
skillTree.description: Allies of the Raven God lurk in every corner of the map, ready to change the tide of war from any direction.

skillTree.name: The Great Sorcerer
skillTree.description: The Winds of Magic dance around the Bringer of Change, swirling through the ranks of his Sorcerers, who draw power from its potent energies.

effects.description:
Chance of Winds of Magic changing in strength: +5%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +5%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic changing in strength: +10%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +10%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic changing in strength: +15%
	(local province)

Chance of Winds of Magic increasing in strength when changing: +15%
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Transition's Troopers
skillTree.description: Their loyalty to the Raven God grants the warriors of Tzeentch a staunch hardiness in battle, for what is change if not the ability to overcome?

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Marauders of Tzeentch, Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch, Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Barrier: +4% for Marauders of Tzeentch, Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch, Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Marauders of Tzeentch, Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch, Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Marauders of Tzeentch, Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch, Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Tempest of Transmutation
skillTree.description: The tides of Change rise and fall, imbuing dark power on those who have proved themselves worthy.

effects.description: Reign of Chaos: additional chance for Tzeentch rewards +5%

skillTree.name: Motivated
skillTree.description: The warriors of Change are driven ever onward by motivations constantly in flux.

skillTree.name: Knowing Diplomat
skillTree.description: Every being desires change in some form or another, and a point of common interest is where all successful negotiations begin.

skillTree.name: Riders of Revision
skillTree.description: Racing into battle at great speed, the Tzeentchian cavalry put every bit of their momentum into each and every strike.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +5% for Chaos Knights of Tzeentch, Doom Knights of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Barrier: +10% for Chaos Knights of Tzeentch, Doom Knights of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +7% for Chaos Knights of Tzeentch, Doom Knights of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Barrier: +15% for Chaos Knights of Tzeentch, Doom Knights of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +9% for Chaos Knights of Tzeentch, Doom Knights of Tzeentch and Burning Chariot of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Behemoths of Perpetual Conversion
skillTree.description: Creatures of all kinds serve the Wind Lord, whose magic imbues them with a strength and speed to transform living foes into dead ones.

effects.description:
Speed: +5% for Chaos Furies, Screamers of Tzeentch, Spawn of Tzeentch and Flamers of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +8% for Chaos Furies, Screamers of Tzeentch, Spawn of Tzeentch and Flamers of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Chaos Furies, Screamers of Tzeentch, Spawn of Tzeentch and Flamers of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for Chaos Furies, Screamers of Tzeentch, Spawn of Tzeentch and Flamers of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Chaos Furies, Screamers of Tzeentch, Spawn of Tzeentch and Flamers of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Tempting Truths
skillTree.description: The Great Sorcerer grants many gifts to His most faithful Heralds of Change.

effects.description: Reign of Chaos: additional chance for Tzeentch rewards +10%

skillTree.name: Winged Warriors
skillTree.description: A cocoon of wing and feather provides protection to the Lords of Change, sheltering them from harm.

effects.description:
Barrier: +5% for Lord of Change units
	(Lord's army)

Barrier: +10% for Lord of Change units
	(Lord's army)

Barrier: +15% for Lord of Change units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Protective Shell
skillTree.description: Encased in Daemonic Warpmetal, the Soul Grinders of Tzeentch feel no pain but the agonising thirst to finally be free.

effects.description:
Barrier: +5% for Tzeentch Soul Grinder units
	(Lord's army)

Barrier: +10% for Tzeentch Soul Grinder units
	(Lord's army)

Barrier: +15% for Tzeentch Soul Grinder units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Barrier of Flame
skillTree.description: A wall of perilous flame lets nothing pass through it without burning the intruder to cinders.

effects.description:
Barrier: +5% for Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Barrier: +10% for Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

Barrier: +15% for Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Commanding Change
skillTree.description: Amidst the storm of Change stand those chosen by T'char to lead the realms into the heart of its churning maelstrom.

backgroundSkills.name: Undivided
backgroundSkills.description: "The Dark Gods empower me, so vengeance will be mine."

effects.description: Customisable via Daemonic Gifts: Equippable gifts are granted through servitude to the Chaos Gods
Access to gifts of Chaos Undivided: These gifts are not directly influenced by any of the Chaos Gods to allow you to represent Chaos and all its glory
Access to gifts of Khorne: These gifts push your prowess in battle to take on any challenger foolish enough to meet you in combat
Access to gifts of Nurgle: These gifts allow you to spread pestilence, suffering and decay to all those who would seek to cause you harm
Access to gifts of Slaanesh: These gifts enable you to become an agile hunter able to chase down any prey that chooses to turn its back on you
Access to gifts of Tzeentch: These gifts grant you the level of knowledge in the Winds of Magic required to change the tides of battle

factionEffects.title: God-Killer
factionEffects.description: The act of god-slaying has drawn the attention of the Dark Powers, and now they war over this wretched prince's soul!
